introText: Weapons and armor can have special perks on them. "Uncommon" or better equipment have some perks by default (the amount depends on the rarity of the item), and more perks can be added by enhancing the item (perks are added at +4, +8, and +10). Perks can be Tier 1, 2 or 3 depending on item quality (regular/superior/flawless) on generation, with higher tiers being better (perks added by enchanting are always Tier 1 regardless of item quality). Common equipment can have perks added by enhancing them to +4 (cannot be enhanced beyond +5).

buffsAndStacksText: Some active perks stack in an unusual way; rather than having an explicit set maximum number of stacks they will instead have a cooldown which is shorter than the effects duration, thus indirectly limiting the number of stacks you can get at once. The reason it is done this way is likely to prevent the player from being able to get maximum stacks too quickly by meeting the activation requirements repeatedly in a short time frame.
